name: dfs.client.short.circuit.replica.stale.threshold.ms
description:
The maximum amount of time that we will consider a short-circuit replica to
    be valid, if there is no communication from the DataNode.  After this time
    has elapsed, we will re-fetch the short-circuit replica even if it is in
    the cache.

name: mapreduce.ifile.readahead.bytes
description: Configuration key to set the IFile readahead length in bytes.

name: dfs.qjournal.finalize-segment.timeout.ms
description:
Quorum timeout in milliseconds during finalizing for a specific
    segment.

name: mapreduce.job.cache.limit.max-resources
description:
The maximum number of resources a map reduce job is allowed to
    submit for localization via files, libjars, archives, and jobjar command
    line arguments and through the distributed cache. If set to 0 the limit is
    ignored.

name: dfs.namenode.delegation.token.max-lifetime
description:
The maximum lifetime in milliseconds for which a delegation 
      token is valid.

name: dfs.qjournal.http.open.timeout.ms
description:
Timeout in milliseconds when open a new HTTP connection to remote
    journals.

name: fs.s3a.socket.send.buffer
description: Socket send buffer hint to amazon connector. Represented in bytes.
